Agenda Wizard - General Information

Specifies the date, time, title, and location of the meeting.

To access this command...

Choose File - Wizards - Agenda - General Attributes


Date

Specifies the date of the meeting.

Time

Specifies the time of the meeting.

Title

Specifies the title of the meeting.

Location

Specifies the location of the meeting.

Go to Agenda Wizard - Headings to include
